# Intro

This is a linked list implementation for NodeJS written in TypeScript.

# How to use
```typescript
const list = new LinkedList([1, 2, 3, 4]);
console.log("content:", list.join(" -> "));
```

See [docs/typedoc](docs/typedoc/README.md) for further infos.
